title: Bugsplat
body: I have been bugsplat 3 games now within the same week and just 5 minutes ago it happened ago and now i have 5 matches of where i have to wait 10 minutes before entering Q. I think this isn't fair is there a riot employee who can help me?

replies.body:
I can't remove the 5-match LPQ that's on your account, but I can assist you in troubleshooting this for sure.

Bugsplats are typically caused by system driver or hardware issues and we've consolidated a list of common solutions for this inside our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes). I strongly urge you to work through that guide in its entirety so we can confirm this isn't caused by a common factor.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

Tried all of the guides doesnt work
 :(
You can send a ticket to Riot Support here ( https://support.riotgames.com/ ).
